channel.title: 13 compile errors help?
channel.description:
ah, my third time posting this question and this one is probably not going to get awnsered either but....
I was trying to add special attacks with handler I thought it I did it all right but when i compiled i got 13 errors which where
[code]client.java:14290: ';' expected } boolean process() ^ client.java:14295: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(12323); ^ client.java:14295: illegal start of type l33thax(12323); ^ client.java:14296: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7574); ^ client.java:14296: illegal start of type l33thax(7574); ^ client.java:14297: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7599); ^ client.java:14297: illegal start of type l33thax(7599); ^ client.java:14298: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7549); ^ client.java:14298: illegal start of type l33thax(7549); ^ client.java:14299: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(8493); ^ client.java:14299: illegal start of type l33thax(8493); ^ client.java:14300: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7499); ^ client.java:14300: illegal start of type l33thax(7499); ^ 13 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
any help?

item.title: 13 compile errors help?

client.java:14290: ';' expected } public boolean process() ^ client.java:14295: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(12323); ^ client.java:14295: illegal start of type l33thax(12323); ^ client.java:14296: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7574); ^ client.java:14296: illegal start of type l33thax(7574); ^ client.java:14297: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7599); ^ client.java:14297: illegal start of type l33thax(7599); ^ client.java:14298: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7549); ^ client.java:14298: illegal start of type l33thax(7549); ^ client.java:14299: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(8493); ^ client.java:14299: illegal start of type l33thax(8493); ^ client.java:14300: invalid method declaration; return type required l33thax(7499); ^ client.java:14300: illegal start of type l33thax(7499); ^ 13 errors Finished! this is what i did diffrent tell me if i did something wrong:

changed } boolean process() if (server.specialHandler.specialAmount <= 99 && server.specialHandler.specialDelay <= 0) { server.specialHandler.specialAmount += 1; server.specialHandler.SpecialBarLength(); } l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499);

to } public boolean process() if (server.specialHandler.specialAmount <= 99 && server.specialHandler.specialDelay <= 0) { server.specialHandler.specialAmount += 1; server.specialHandler.SpecialBarLength(); } l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499);

item.title: 13 compile errors help?
item.dc:creator: @jacobhankal jacobhankal
item.description:
@jacobhankal wrote:

public boolean specspell(int castID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int startHeight, int endHeight, int enemyY,int enemyX, int Lockon) { try { fcastid = castID; fcasterY = casterY; fcasterX = casterX; foffsetY = offsetY; foffsetX = offsetX; fangle = angle; fspeed = speed; fsh = startHeight; feh = endHeight; fenemyY = enemyY; fenemyX = enemyX; fLockon = Lockon; actionTimer = 0; //Casts Spell In Hands if(cast == false) { createProjectile(casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, castID, startHeight, endHeight, Lockon); cast = true; firingspell = true; } //Fires Projectile if(cast == true && fired == false) { firingspell = false; cast = false; fired = false; } } catch(Exception E) { } return true; } public void ProjectileSpec(int startID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int index, int enemyY, int enemyX) { { try { server.specialHandler.createSpec(startID, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, 43, 31, enemyY, enemyX, index+1); } catch(Exception E) { } } } boolean process() if (server.specialHandler.specialAmount <= 99 && server.specialHandler.specialDelay <= 0) { server.specialHandler.specialAmount += 1; server.specialHandler.SpecialBarLength(); } l33thax(12323); l33thax(7574); l33thax(7599); l33thax(7549); l33thax(8493); l33thax(7499); { // is being called regularily every 500ms im pretty sure my error was somewhere in there.

Read full topic
